channel.title: productivity on Imaculate's Internet home
channel.description: Recent content in productivity on Imaculate's Internet home

item.title: S.O.S
item.description: When I first heard of the term SOS run from my run club, I thought it was a type of a fast run powered by adrenaline with some sort of simulated danger like sprinters in bear costume. As wild as my imagination was, I was partly right, a SOS run is indeed fast but there are no bears or costumes involved at least not planned. So what exactly is an SOS run?
